List<Account> acclist = [Select id from account where name='Lexidata Corporation'];
Account acc1;
if(acclist.size() < 1) {
    acc1 = new Account(name='Lexidata Corporation');
    insert acc1;
    acclist.add(acc1);
} else {
    acc1 = acclist.get(0);
}

DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UsageTracker__c where JBCXM__account__r.name='Lexidata Corporation'];
DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c where JBCXM__account__r.name='Lexidata Corporation'];

List<JBCXM__PickList__c> statusList = [Select id, Name from JBCXM__PickList__c where JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Status' and JBCXM__SystemName__c ='ActiveCustomer'];
if(statusList.size() <1) {
    System.debug('No Customer status ActiveCustomer found in your org');
}

List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custList = new List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
for(Account acc : acclist) {
    JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cust = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Account__c = acc.Id,
                                            JBCXM__Status__c =statusList.get(0).Id);
    custList.add(cust);
}
insert custList;

List<String> utList = new List<String>{'Emails Sent Count', 'Files Upload Count', 'Network Traffic Created'};
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = [SELECT Id, JBCXM__UsageTrackingMeasure__c FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE Name IN: utList and
                                    JBCXM__AdoptionMeasure__c=true and JBCXM__Category__c='Adoption Measure Types' ORDER BY Name];
for(JBCXM__PickList__c pk : pkList) {
         pk.JBCXM__UsageTrackingMeasure__c =  true;
}
update pkList;

List<JBCXM__UsageTracker__c> usTList = new List<JBCXM__UsageTracker__c>();

JBCXM__UsageTracker__c ut;
List<String> modulesList = new List<String>{'Customers', 'Transactions', 'Adoption', 'Rules Engine', 'Retention'};
List<String> userNames = new List<String>{'Giribabu', 'Somu', 'Srinivas', 'Sunand', 'Sri Vidya', 'Sai Ram', 'Hitesh'};

for(Account acc : accList) {
    integer a = 0 , b = 0, c = 0;
    for(integer i =0 ;i<20; i++) {
	ut = new JBCXM__UsageTracker__c(JBCXM__Account__c= acc.Id,
										JBCXM__AdoptionMeasure__c = pkList.get(a).Id,
										JBCXM__ActionTime__c = datetime.now().addDays(-i),
										JBCXM__Module__c = modulesList.get(b),
										JBCXM__UserName__c = userNames.get(c));
	usTList.add(ut);
    a++;b++;c++;
    if(a==pkList.size()) {a=0;}
    if(b==modulesList.size()){b=0;}
    if(c==userNames.size()){c=0;}
}

}
System.debug(usTList.size());
insert usTList;
